thread.title: Here's Where to Watch the Democratic Presidential Debate on Tuesday

title: Here's Where to Watch the Democratic Presidential Debate on Tuesday
text:
The Bronx 4 Bernie Sanders and the NY Hispanics 4 Bernie are gathering at Charlies at 8 p.m. Attendance is free. Email csuarez47@optonline.net or call 347-353-6495 to RSVP. 
Staten Island 
â–º Flagship Brewery, 40 Minthorne St., Stapleton 
This "Feel the Bern Debate Watch Party" starts at 7 p.m. There will be music, prizes and snacks. Flagship beer will be available for purchase.
